content: Started my professional journey studying Medicine at the University of Cambridge. During this time, I developed innovative study techniques and built a successful side business helping students get into medical school.
Worked as a junior doctor at Addenbrooke's Hospital and West Suffolk Hospital, gaining experience in multiple specialties including Cardiology, Psychiatry, and General Surgery.
Continued growing my YouTube channel while working full-time in medicine, reaching 100,000 subscribers.
Made the transition from medicine to full-time content creation and entrepreneurship. Grew the YouTube channel to 1 million subscribers.
Started building a team and establishing business systems to support sustainable growth.
Published 'Feel-Good Productivity' which became a New York Times and Sunday Times bestseller. The book has been translated into 35+ languages.
extraContent: Expanded the team and launched multiple educational products including courses and workshops focused on productivity and personal development.

content: Continued to scale the business globally, reaching millions of people worldwide through various platforms and products. Currently based in Hong Kong, working on new projects and initiatives.
